body.p: To his Exl B Magoffin governor of Ky.

We the undersigned citizens of Rockcastle county state that we have known Jacob Scarborough who is now confined in the penatentiary for killing Robert Aulder for between Thirty and forty years, he was borned in this and raised in this county He is a peaceable quiet old man inoffensive a good citizen, poor and has a large helpless and now destitute family, and we must respectfully ask your Exln to pardon the balance of his time

H. Moore
Alfred ,Smith
